title: Unable to set volume level for Wireless Charging and Screen Locking sounds - they are too quiet
content:
Since Google update the volume level for Screen Locking and Wireless Charging sounds are now way too low - I can only just hear them if I put the phone right to my ear. Previously the sound levels were maximum (which I actually quite liked).

There is no way to adjust the volume level for Screen Locking and Wireless Charging sounds - we really need this.

I really liked being able to "hear" when my Pixel was charging on wireless charger in my car for example, I would not need to look at the phone, I could "hear" that it had started charging. Also I used to really like the "clunk" screen locking sound, now its gone :-( 

Please give us the ability to set these volume levels independent of every other setting like Notification and Ringtone.

Regards,

Julian
